casebody.data:
THETFORD PROPERTIES III LIMITED PARTNERSHIP D/B/A Beaumont Avenue Apartments, by and Through its Agent Thetford Property Management, Inc.
v.
Richard MILLER. No. 175P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 3, 2005. William K. Brownlee, Raleigh, for Thetford Properties, et al. Richard A. Miller, Sr., Pro Se.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 1st day of April 2005 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd day of November 2005."
